content:
# I have successfully returned to the stone furnace's position again.
# 
# Now, I will retrieve the stone furnace entity and insert the newly harvested iron ore into it to allow it to continue smelting into iron plates.

stone_furnace = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}, position=Position(x=-7.0, y=7.0))[0]  # Retrieve the stone furnace entity.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace, quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 iron ore into the stone furnace to continue smelting.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking the updated inventory after insertion.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the entities on the map after the operation.
